surname Nan
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
Nanming district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou

sentences.english: Along both banks of the river, there are the busiest sections downtown and green wooded mountains. That is Nanming District.
sentences.chinese: 河流兩旁繁華的鬧市和青翠的山嶺就是南明區。

sentences.english: The paper mainly introduces the general design of the Nanming River Sewage Interception Ditch Project.
sentences.chinese: 該文主要介紹南明河截污溝工程總體設計。

definition: Manchurian Qing (refers to the Qing dynasty, esp. at its decline, or as an anti-Qing slogan)
